price: ‘আমাৰ প্ৰথম মৃত্যুৰ পিছত আৰু আমাক শাস্তিও দিয়া নহ'ব!’
arabic: إِلَّا مَوۡتَتَنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: illā mawtatanā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
